title: Alumni Association-College of Economic and Social Development
content: Alumni Association-College of Economic and Social Development  HOME About CESDMission and VisionAdministrationVisit CESD Academic ProgramsDoctoral ProgramsMaster’s ProgramsInternational Collaboration Programs Research & FacultyAcademic AreaResearch ProgressCommunity ImpactFaculty Members Alumni CommunityAlumni AssociationAlumni EventsBenefits & Services中文Nankai University in Tianjin of China NKU College of Economic and Social Development 中文About CESDMission and VisionAdministrationVisit CESDAcademic ProgramsDoctoral ProgramsMaster’s ProgramsInternational Collaboration ProgramsResearch & FacultyAcademic AreaResearch ProgressCommunity ImpactFaculty MembersAlumni CommunityAlumni AssociationAlumni EventsBenefits & ServicesAlumni CommunityAlumni AssociationAlumni EventsBenefits & ServicesAlumni AssociationSince its establishment in 1998, the College of Economic and Social Development of Nankai University has continuously developed and expanded over the past 20 years, forming a rich and varied system of talent cultivation. As of June 2022, there were a total of 8930 alumni (930 full-time graduate students and 8000 cooperative graduate students), spread throughout major cities across the country, contributing to economic and social development.The College of Economic and Social Development Alumni Association was established in November 2014 and is mainly composed of full-time master's and doctoral graduates, as well as part-time master's graduates jointly trained by Nankai University and Flinders University. It provides a platform for alumni to communicate, learn, and innovate through regular events.Since 2022, the Alumni Association has established five liaison departments in Beijing, Tianjin, the Yangtze River Delta, the Pearl River Delta, and Western China. With the support of the Nankai University Alumni Association, we lead alumni to organize various activities to better serve their needs.  Community5The Regional Liaison Department integrates alumni resources in its region to provide better service.352Our Alumni originate from most first and second tier cities in China.9100The greatest number of alumni compared with similar cooperative study programs in China. As of June 2022, there were a total of 8930 alumni (930 full-time graduate students and 8000 cooperative graduate students), spread throughout major cities across the country, contributing to economic and social development.The College of Economic and Social Development Alumni Association was established in November 2014 and is mainly composed of full-time master's and doctoral graduates, as well as part-time master's graduates jointly trained by Nankai University and Flinders University. It provides a platform for alumni to communicate, learn, and innovate through regular events.Since 2022, the Alumni Association has established five liaison departments in Beijing, Tianjin, the Yangtze River Delta, the Pearl River Delta, and Western China. With the support of the Nankai University Alumni Association, we lead alumni to organize various activities to better serve their needs.
